title: RuPaul’s Drag Race’s Adore Delano is joining Ex On The Beach spin-off
text:
Adore Delano has been confirmed for Ex On The Beach (Picture: Getty Images)

RuPaul’s Drag Race star Adore Delano is set to return to our TV screens on Ex On The Beach’s upcoming reality series Peak Of Love.

Adore – real name Daniel Noriega – competed in the sixth season of RuPaul’s show, reaching the final three and eventually losing out to winner Bianca Del Rio.

Announcing her participation in the MTV show on Friday, Adore uploaded a picture of the cast to Twitter with the caption: ‘From the beach to the damn slopes! Catch us Thursday, December 5th at 9PM on @MTV #ExOnTheBeach.’

‘Literally too excited!!!!! Christmas is coming early this year!’ one fan wrote in response.

Another wrote: ‘I’m really happy they gave you a platform to show who you are and that what you do is great.

‘It’ll broaden many people’s horizons and I’m grateful for that.’

From the beach 🌊 to the damn slopes! 🏔 Catch us Thursday, December 5th at 9PM on @MTV #ExOnTheBeach pic.twitter.com/gXLW0WCDXi — Adore Delano (@AdoreDelano) October 25, 2019

Advertisement

Advertisement

The show will also feature Love Island’s Georgia Steel, The Bachelorette’s Daniel Maguire, Glam Masters’ La Demi Martinez, Are You The One?’s Tyranny Todd, American Idol’s Ryan Gallagher and more.

Set to drop later this year, the Ex On The Beach US show will follow a total of ten reality stars as they deal with their exes and search for love.

Only this time, rather than taking place on an actual beach, this series will follow the cast on their adventure through the mountains of Queenstown, New Zealand.

Which is worse, encountering your terrible ex on the beach or on a mountain?

Both seem less than ideal, but guess we’ll just have to watch the show to find out…

Ex on the Beach: Peak of Love will premiere 5 December in the US and in January 2020 in the UK.

description: RuPaul’s Drag Race star Adore Delano is set to return to our TV screens on Ex On The Beach’s upcoming reality series Peak Of Love.
